commit message:
Fix problem with the NetworkAdapter

that occured if the list was filtered right after the list of SSIDs was updated.
Reimplement parts of NetworkAdapter
Use Fragments
Add tabs
Add feature to show nearest Freifunk nodes
Add progress bar to nearest ap
Add settings for nearest access points
Improve ProgressBars
Improve ProgressBars and other ui elements
Fix distance calculation
Improve UI
Fix strings at app selection
Switch positions of AddRemoveNetworks and NearestNodes tabs.
Check online for new nodes.json file and improve progressBars
Remove old, now redundant code for ProgressDialogs.
Fix crash that occurred if no internet connection was available
Update readme
Fix typo
Improve layout of the distance from an access point
Merge branch 'nearest_ap'
Remove posibility to add own SSIDs.
Create release v0.6
